pages.text: The $(mob)Cow$() is an animal commonly found in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It flees when hit and can be bred using $(item)Wheat$().$(p)It is a great source of food and various other materials. See the next pages for details on them.
$(mob)Cows$() drop $(item)Raw Beef$() on death, a great source of food when cooked. They also drop $(item)Leather$(), which can be made into armor or various other items such as $(item)Books$().
Using an empty $(item)Bucket$() on a $(mob)Cow$() fills it with $(item)Milk$(). It can then be drinked to clear all potion effects on the user.
